mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GH_User (userid, userpw, username, userPhone, userEmail) VALUES (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})

mapper.update: UPDATE GH_User SET userName = #{userName}, userPhone = #{userPhone}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, useradd = #{useradd}, updatedate = now() WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT m.userid userid, m.userpw userpw, m.username username, m.userPhone userPhone, m.CompanyRegistrationNumber CompanyRegistrationNumber, m.userEmail userEmail, m.useradd useradd, m.enabled enabled, m.regdate regdate, m.updateDate updateDate, m.userpoint userpoint, m.spendpoint spendpoint, a.auth auth FROM GH_User m LEFT JOIN GH_auth a ON m.userid = a.userid WHERE m.userid = #{userid} AND enabled = 1
